Each affordable unit will have access to
The Curtis Apartments is a brand-new, 250 unit rental apartment community located on 161 Mechanic
There will be 63 affordable apartments ready for occupancy starting in Fall of
All affordable apartments will be rented to households with incomes at or below 80% of the area
median income through this application process.
This community is located on approximately 15 acres
and will include 5 residential buildings along with an amenities-rich clubhouse, pool, playground, a dog
park, a fire pit and grilling stations and outdoor dining areas for residents.
stainless-steel appliances, solid surface countertops and in-unit washer and dryers.
have an elevator, and affordable units are evenly dispersed across each building.
MAXIMUM Household Income Limits: $78,300 (1 person), $89,500 (2 people), $100,700 (3 people)
